answer: Care must be taken to manage heat in the turbocharger. This is true during operation and is managed by watching the turbine inlet temperature. Also, at engine shutdown the engine should be allowed to run at a low power setting to allow the turbocharger to cool down. Failing to do so can damage the turbocharger and shorten it's operating life.
